groups.name: docx
groups.description: Configuration properties for Docx API documentation generator.

groups.name: docx.branding
groups.description: Branding configuration for the documentation UI.

groups.name: docx.scan
groups.description: Configuration for scanning controllers and generating documentation.

groups.name: docx.features
groups.description: Feature toggles for the documentation generator.

properties.name: docx.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Docx API documentation generation.

properties.name: docx.base-path
properties.description: Base path where the documentation will be served.

properties.name: docx.theme
properties.description: Default theme for the documentation UI (light, dark, auto).

properties.name: docx.title
properties.description: Title of the API documentation.

properties.name: docx.version
properties.description: Version of the API being documented.

properties.name: docx.description
properties.description: Description of the API being documented.

properties.name: docx.branding.title
properties.description: Title shown in the UI branding.

properties.name: docx.branding.color
properties.description: Primary brand color used in the UI.

properties.name: docx.branding.logo-url
properties.description: URL to the logo image shown in the UI.

properties.name: docx.scan.auto-discover
properties.description: Whether to automatically discover and scan all controllers in the project.

properties.name: docx.scan.exclude-packages
properties.description: List of package patterns to exclude from scanning.

properties.name: docx.scan.include-packages
properties.description: List of package patterns to include in scanning (if specified, only these packages are scanned).

properties.name: docx.scan.include-validation
properties.description: Whether to include validation constraints in the documentation.

properties.name: docx.scan.include-examples
properties.description: Whether to include examples in the documentation.

properties.name: docx.scan.include-test-controllers
properties.description: Whether to include controllers from test packages.

properties.name: docx.features.search
properties.description: Whether to enable the search functionality in the UI.

properties.name: docx.features.try-it-out
properties.description: Whether to enable the try-it-out functionality for endpoints.

properties.name: docx.features.export-openapi
properties.description: Whether to provide OpenAPI specification export.

properties.name: docx.features.auto-generate-examples
properties.description: Whether to automatically generate examples using AOP.

properties.name: docx.features.manual-response-docs
properties.description: Whether to prefer manual @apiResponse tags over auto-detected response codes.
